questions.question: Did the UNITED STATES OF AMERICA participate in both WORLD WAR II and the COLD WAR?
questions.explanation: The UNITED STATES OF AMERICA was involved in WORLD WAR II and also played a significant role in the COLD WAR.

questions.question: Is PARIS associated with more than one UNESCO-related entity?
questions.explanation: PARIS is associated with UNESCO and its role in hosting international organizations, among other UNESCO-related entities.

questions.question: Is NICE connected to MONACO and FRANCE?
questions.explanation: NICE is connected to neighboring MONACO and is a part of FRANCE.

questions.question: Which organization has ties with NEW YORK CITY and NAIROBI?
Does GEORGE WASHINGTON have any direct connection to WASHINGTON, D.C.?
questions.explanation: GEORGE WASHINGTON is connected to WASHINGTON, D.C. which was named in his honor.
